name: blockchain-banking-app
description: A blockchain-based banking application with FastAPI backend and React frontend

scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001 --reload
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
